characters-on-grid.jpeg.description: two pyret characters located at (1,8) and (9,2) on a coordinate plane. They are connected by a right triangle whose legs are 6 units and 8 units and hypotenuse is labeled "how far apart?"

circles-of-distance.png.description: the start of the circles of evaluation for computing the distance between (0,2) and (4,5)

circles-of-distance-soln.png.description: the circles of evaluation for computing the distance between (0,2) and (4,5)

coordinates-1.png.description: An x-y coordinate plane is shown with a right triangle connecting a pyret at (-3,-2) and a boot at (9,3)

coordinates-2.png.description: An x-y coordinate plane is shown with a right triangle connecting a pyret at (0,1) and a boot at (8,7)

desert.png.description: Screenshot of a desert game. A right triangle connects a cactus and a raindrop. The vertical distance between them is 166 and the horizontal distance is 276

flowers.png.description: A screenshot of game. A right triagle connects a cyclist and the cop who's chasing him. The vertical distance between them is 113 and the horizontal distance between them is 257

game-3.png.description: Screenshot of a game. A right triangle connects a cyclist and the cop that's chasing him. The position of the cyclist is (170,400). The position of the cop is (525,300)

game-4.png.description: Screenshot of a game. A right triangle connects a cyclist and the chicken he's chasing. The position of the cyclist is (385, 110). The position of the chicken is (230,390).

graph00to43.jpeg.description: A right triangle with legs of lengths 4 and 3 connects the points (0, 0) and (4,3).

pxpy.png.description: Screenshot of a game where the Chicken (px,py) and the bicyclist (cx, cy) are connected by the hypotenuse of a right triangle

pxpy2.png.description: Screenshot of a game where the Chicken (px,py) and the bicyclist (cx, cy) are connected by the hypotenuse of a right triangle

pyret1.png.description: Screenshot of a game. A right triangle connects the bootstrap logo and Bonnie the Pyret. The position of the boot is (150,300). The position of the pyret is (600,110).

pyret2.png.description: Screenshot of a game. A right triangle connects the bootstrap logo and Bonnie the Pyret. The position of the boot is (210,85). The position of the pyret is (405,450).

pythag-diagram.png.description: A right triangle with a square attached to each of its legs, such that the smallest leg (a) has an orange square composed of 9 square units, the longer leg (b) has a pink square composed of 16 square units, and the red square off the hypotenuse (c) is composed of 25 square units
pythag-diagram.png.source: Gregg Tavares, CC BY-SA 4.0 <https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0>, via Wikimedia Commons

screenshot.jpg.description: game image: astronaut and space craft on a landscape, with a right triangle showing the horizontal, vertical and diagonal distance between them

sewers.png.description: Screenshot of a sewer game. A right triangle connects a two characters. The horizontal distance between them is 194 and the diagonal distance is 276
